name: Kelly's Korner
description:
A game made for the GMTK Jam 2018!

The theme was Genre, but you can't Mechanic. I used that as "Cooking game: But you can't use regular utensils". I also based the game on It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia for fun!

In this game you'll be making a couple of the gang's classic foods, like Milk Steak and Riot Punch. 

NOTE: Sometimes Chrome might be laggy, so I recommend playing in Firefox.

Music: "Quirky Dog" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
